data.name: Resuffer Demo
data.detailed_description: Resuffer is an action rogue-lite where you play in two parallel realms; psychosis and reality. This demo focuses on the psychosis realm and shows the core gameplay of each rogue-lite cycle.
data.about_the_game: Resuffer is an action rogue-lite where you play in two parallel realms; psychosis and reality. This demo focuses on the psychosis realm and shows the core gameplay of each rogue-lite cycle.
